edu.rit.draw.item

Class ColorFill

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.draw.item.ColorFill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Fill, Externalizable, Serializable

    public class ColorFill
extends Object
implements Fill
    Class ColorFill provides an object that fills an area in a DrawingItem with a solid color.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
